body:
@Antiarchitect the best way to put commit messages is one short line with summary and something more below, something like:

```
Convert Hash to HashWithIndifferentAccess in ActiveRecord::Store.

In order to make migration from 3.x apps easier, we should try to convert
Hash instances to HashWithIndifferentAccess, to allow accessing values
with both symbol and a string. This is follow up to changes in 3c0bf043.
```

I'm not sure if that accurately describes what are the changes, so if I missed something please use your own words, I just wanted to show the example (and that it would be great if we have reference to the previous commit).
